Having recited this mantra,
At that time, the devas, humans, yakshas, gandharvas, asuras, kinnaras, mahoragas,
rakshasas, bhutas, and prana-yakas,
upon hearing the great mantra, covered their faces in fear,
displayed their great spiritual powers, and sought protection and rescue.
They took refuge and praised Tara Bodhisattva,
whose eyes are pure and vast, whose mind practices truth,
who looks upon the three realms with impartiality,
whose eyes emit compassionate light like Avalokitesvara,
who benefits beings like a blooming lotus.
At that time, the Heavenly King of Freedom,
bared his right shoulder and touched his right knee to the ground.
And all the devas, humans, asuras, and assembly of vidyadharas,
gathered and knelt for a long time, also like this.
Then the Heavenly King of Freedom spoke the mantra, saying:ğŸ”½Namo namastasmai tathÄgatÄya |

At that time, TÄrÄ Bodhisattva,
Extending her light to illuminate the ten directions,

And said to MahÃªÅ›vara and the heavenly beings, Listen attentively with a sincere mind.
All TathÄgatas, endowed with the ten powers, always provide protection.
There is such vast and majestic bodhisattva conduct.
Liberating you from the suffering of the ocean of cyclic existence and the great fear of birth and death.
Reaching the ultimate other shore of nirvana.
Causing the mind to give rise to practice and faithfully accept the teachings.
At that time there was a buddha named Light Flame Various Adornments TathÄgata.
And again said that the power of this great mantra.
For all beings in the water and on land it acts as a great savior.
For the dark it acts as a great light.
For all karmic hindrances it gives rise to wholesome roots.
This great vajra dhÄraá¹‡Ä«.
Heard by the buddhas of the past it forms a corresponding practice.
The knower attains a pure mind.
It transforms into the supreme auspicious samÄdhi.
All faults and evils are thereby eliminated.
All sinful karma is thereby not produced.
If there are people who listen and uphold it.
Single-mindedly read and recite it as the Buddha has said.
All activities will be accomplished.
All afflictions will be liberated.
All sentient beings' wishes will be fulfilled.
The wisdom of the TathÄgata is unequaled in the world.
Moreover, reciting and chanting these one hundred and eight names,
TÄrÄ Bodhisattva will rescue and guide,
and one will attain the accomplishment of one's sought-after perfect enlightenment.
If a king, minister, elder, or householder,
all sentient beings will submit to them.

At that time, Buddha Light Flame said,
That person enters the TathÄgata family,
is truly equal to the power of the lion's light,
and is able to awaken devas and humans with the power of diligence.
They attain the TathÄgata's supreme dignity, fame, and greatness.
They skillfully understand the characteristics of phenomena and bring the most excellent benefits.
Moreover, that Buddha said,
The mind free from desire is joyful, and afflictions do not arise.
Dwelling well in comfort, giving rise to an expansive mind, and being at ease for a long time,
TÄrÄ Bodhisattva loves and protects.
and all the devas, nÄgas, and spirits
